to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: DECTalk Express driver
body:
On Fri, Apr 13, 2007 at 05:14:28PM -0400, Kirk Reiser wrote:
> afternoon.  It does not have read all mode and I won't work on
> reinstating that until we have the git repository speakup version
> working correctly.

Hi Kirk,

Was the express driver broken prior to today in CVS?  My
checkout for the Debian iso was two days ago for
integration into a fairly heavily patched 2.6.18 and
everything did compile after a bit of coercing.  I don't
have an express to test though so just wondering if I
should remaster with the new CVS.

S

--
